# Aisle - AI Wedding Planner

> Aisle is an AI-powered wedding planning assistant that helps couples plan their perfect wedding through natural conversation.

## About Aisle

Aisle is an AI wedding planner built to help engaged couples navigate the complexity of wedding planning. Unlike traditional wedding planning tools that overwhelm users with forms and checklists, Aisle uses conversational AI to provide personalized guidance.

## What Aisle Does

Aisle helps couples with:

- **Budget Planning**: Create and track wedding budgets, get cost estimates for different wedding sizes and styles
- **Timeline Management**: Build planning timelines based on wedding date, know what to do and when
- **Vendor Selection**: Get advice on choosing venues, photographers, caterers, florists, and other vendors
- **Guest Management**: Organize guest lists, track RSVPs, manage dietary requirements
- **Seating Arrangements**: Plan table layouts and seating charts
- **Day-of Coordination**: Create detailed schedules for the wedding day
- **Emotional Support**: Get encouragement and practical advice when feeling overwhelmed

## How to Interact with Aisle

Users interact with Aisle through natural conversation. Simply describe what you need help with, and Aisle will provide personalized advice based on your specific situation.

Example conversations:
- "We have a $30,000 budget for 120 guests. Is that realistic?"
- "What should we be doing 6 months before our wedding?"
- "I'm stressed about seating arrangements. My divorced parents don't get along."
- "How do I choose between two venues?"

## Technical Details

- **Website**: https://aisleboard.com
- **Type**: AI Wedding Planning Assistant
- **Interaction**: Conversational AI chat interface
- **Availability**: Web-based, accessible on desktop and mobile
- **Pricing**: Free tier available, premium plans for unlimited access

## API Access

Aisle does not currently offer a public API. The AI assistant is available through the web interface at https://aisleboard.com.

## Contact

- **Website**: https://aisleboard.com
- **Email**: hello@aisleboard.com
- **Support**: support@aisleboard.com
